Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 9 miles from Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur, while Arles Amphitheatre is 21 miles away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 5.6 miles from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

hotel_name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and an electric kettle. There is a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

hotel_facilities: Books, DVDs or music for children
hotel_description:
Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator is a luxury hotel located in the city of Nimes. Bordering the Jardin de la Fontaine, L'Imperator is less than five minutes’ walk from the Maison Carrée Roman temple and the Carrée d'Art museum. Past guests of this historic hotel include Ava Gardner, Ernest Hemingway, and Torero El Cordobes.

Rooms are in a Mediterranean style with natural stone, marble and wood. Equipped with a walk-in shower, each room also has a Smart TV with ChromeCast so you can view and share your personal content. Some rooms overlook the hotel gardens.

L'Imperator features a 24/7 reception desk, and has baby equipment and services for children. The Spa by CODAGE offers an indoor and outdoor pool, a Jacuzzi, a sensory shower and a hammam, as well as a full range of massages.

L’Imperator is the home of Pierre Gagnaire, an award-winning chef elected best chef in the world by his peers, and the two onsite restaurants offer guests 2 different gastronomic experiences. The Duende gourmet restaurant is the place to experience extraordinary flavors. L'Impé brasserie, located on the Imperator’s inner patio in the shade of a Ginkgo Biloba tree, serves a generous and refined cuisine highlighting local produce.

The Hemingway Bar offers cocktails in a relaxed setting. A continental breakfast is served daily, or you can enjoy breakfast in your room.

A private, on-site car park is available upon reservation. Nimes TGV Train Station is less than 1.2 mi from L'Imperator.

hotel_address: 43, Rue Saint Nicolas, 17000 La Rochelle, France

The property accepts dogs less than 10 kg .

Accessed via a staircase, every room includes air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a view over the internal patio or Assas Square. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served daily, made with a selection of fresh organic produce. You can sample Spanish cuisine and fish à la plancha in the restaurant. Tapas can be enjoyed on the bar’s outdoor terrace.

Tango evenings are organized on Assas Square during July and August. There are also regular art viewings and exhibitions held on the square.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 1.7 mi from Royal Hôtel. Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 33 mi from the property.

hotel_description:
Located 1.8 mi from Rock of the Blessed Virgin in Biarritz and 1.2 mi from Milady Beach, Hotel Biarritz Atlantique is housed in a hotel management school featuring a restaurant and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free private parking is available on site.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom.

Guests wishing to enjoy a homemade meal at the on-site restaurant must book their table in advance.

Ilbarritz Golf course is 1.5 mi away and Biarritz city center 2.5 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Anglet Airport, 1.2 mi from the property. A63 Motorway is 1.6 mi from Hotel Biarritz Atlantique.

hotel_address: Boulevard Prince de Galles, 64200 Biarritz, France
hotel_description:
Carlina Lodge is a hotel residence located on Biarritz sea front. It offers rooms with a terrace and view over the sea, as well as free WiFi access in public area.

Serviced by a elevator, Carlina Lodge rooms have TV with cable channels and a terrace. They all offer a private bathroom with a bath tub and free toiletries.

There, breakfast can be enjoyed in the comfort of the room. Within a 5-minute walk, guests will find restaurants and bars.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including golfing. Biarritz Train Station is 2.5 mi away. Free public parking is possible on site.

Le Saphir is located in Biarritz, just 656 feet from the Old Port and the sandy beaches. It offers free Wi-Fi access in each en-suite guest room.

A continental breakfast is served daily and guests can enjoy their meal on the hotel’s south-facing patio.

The bedrooms all have a private bathroom and a TV.

Located in Biarritz’s city center, Le Saphir is in a lively area with several bars and restaurants close by. Guests can also visit Sainte-Eugenie Church and the Aquarium, located 1148 feet away.

hotel_address: 14 rue du Port Vieux, 64200 Biarritz, France
hotel_facilities: Upper floors accessible by stairs only
hotel_description:
Facing the Atlantic Ocean and featuring a terrace, Hôtel Les Baigneuses de Biarritz is located in the heart of Biarritz, just 164 feet from the Plage du Port Vieux. The hotel offers free WiFi access and all the guest rooms have a view of the sea.

The guest rooms include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

The restaurant at Hôtel Les Baigneuses de Biarritz serves brasserie meals and drinks can be enjoyed in the on-site bar. The continental breakfast consists of fresh bread, 1 French pastry, a hot drink, fresh orange juice, butter and marmalade.

The property does not have a elevator. The hotel has no parking, the closest is the Saint Eugénie which is underground.

Biarritz – Anglet – Bayonne Airport is 3.1 mi from the hotel and Biarritz Train Station is 2.5 mi away. The property is 5.6 mi from the center Bayonne and a 37-minute drive from Hendaye.

hotel_name: Hôtel Jules Verne, BW Signature Collection
hotel_description:
The hotel is located in central Biarritz, near the Palais des Festivals, the casino and the local beaches. Guests are invited to use the heated outdoor swimming pool.

All the modern rooms at the Hôtel Littéraire Jules Verne are air-conditioned and soundproofed and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite. Free Wi-Fi is provided and adjoining rooms are available on request.

Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the comfort of guest rooms and a Nespresso coffee machine is available in some rooms.

The friendly and attentive staff at the hotel will be happy to help you organize your stay in Biarritz 24 hours a day. Parking in a garage s available with an extra cost.

Facing the beachfront, Le Garage Biarritz Hôtel offers 4-star accommodations in Biarritz and has a terrace, restaurant and bar. The property is located 1.2 miles from Cote des Basques Beach, 3.1 miles from Biarritz La Négresse Train Station and 11 miles from Saint Jean de Luz Train Station. Private parking is available on site.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with an electric tea pot. All rooms include a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a patio and some have city views.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area.

Popular points of interest near Le Garage Biarritz Hôtel include Plage Miramar, VVF Beach and Grande Plage. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 2.5 miles from the accommodation.

Located in the center of Biarritz, the Radisson Blu Hotel overlooks the Côte des Basques surfer's beach, and is surrounded by nightlife, tapas bars, casino, local market and the Marine Museum. It features an outdoor rooftop pool, fitness center and spa offering at a surcharge a range of massages, face and body treatments, hammam and sauna.

This 4-star property offers soundproofed air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom, a courtesy tray, a mini-bar and cable TV service.

Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. During school holidays, a play room with puzzles and Wii games is also available.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests can enjoy regional and international cuisine at the hotel’s restaurants and bars. There is a shaded terrace with panoramic views of the Atlantic coastline and the Pyrenees Mountains.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Biarritz Airport. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

Fully renovated in 2021, the environmentally-friendly Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is located on the beachfront, in the heart of Biarritz. It offers modern accommodations with sea views and free Wi-Fi access. A room service as well as a conciergerie service are provided.

It has soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. Each elegantly designed room has an private bathroom, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and views of the sea, the town or the courtyard.

Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz offers two breakfast options. Guests can choose from a continental breakfast in the room or a buffet breakfast. The bistronomic restaurant, 'Chez Eugénie Biarritz', offers seafood and meals made with fresh and seasonal produce, cooked on site.

A public car park is available 164 feet from the hotel, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is within easy access of the town’s many shops, covered market, the Aquarium, the Rocher de la Vierge and Bellevue Casino Congress Center.

hotel_address: 35 Avenue du Maréchal Joffre, 64200 Biarritz, France
hotel_description:
Blending vibrant surroundings, a number of facilities and an inviting atmosphere, the Best Western Kemaris hotel features typical architecture of the Basque Country.

Bright and spacious, the guest rooms at the Kemaris feature sophisticated decor and a number of modern comforts, with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each room includes beautiful decor blending design and natural touches, and some of them also include a large terrace.

A buffet breakfast consisting of regional products is prepared every morning at this hotel, and you can enjoy a drink from the bar.

The Kemaris Best Western is in a great location for discovering the city of Biarritz by foot, and there are many restaurants and bars within walking distance of the property. Private on-site parking is available upon reservation.

hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Just a few steps from downtown Biarritz, the Sofitel Biarritz le Miramar overlooks one of the most beautiful beaches of the Basque Coast. As each season has its own sweetness, all 126 rooms and suites have a terrace with a view of the ocean or the architecture of Biarritz. For infinite serenity, you have direct access to the Thalasso.

Our Chef Robert Job maintains the reputation of a precursory restoration. He draws his inspiration from local products from the fishing and the terroir to create an imaginative and equilibrated cuisine. Restaurant, Bar, Terrace or Room-Service, at each hour of the day its light, its atmosphere and its gourmandize.

A unique experience is waiting for you in our intimate treatment pavilions with subdued lighting. Relax your body and mind with our collection of personalized treatments : facials, sculpting, beauty, health and well-being at 360°.

To breathe : panoramic outdoor seawater pool(unheated from 11/5/23 to 3/31/24) , indoor seawater pool
To move: high-tech fitness room facing the ocean, private coaching, aqua gym, Pilates.

Hotel Saint Julien is a 19th-century family residence located in peaceful gardens just a 2-minute walk from the city center of Biarritz. It offers rooms with attached bathroom with free Wi-Fi. Some rooms have views of the ocean and Pyrenees Mountains.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or on the hotel’s terrace. It can also be served in your bedroom at an extra cost.

Guests can visit the Côte Basque beaches which are approximately 656 feet from the hotel.

hotel_name: Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre
hotel_address: 3 avenue du Jardin Public, 64200 Biarritz, France
hotel_description:
Hôtel & Espace Bien-être La Maison du Lierre is located in Biarritz, 984 feet from the beach and 5 minutes from the convention centers Bellevue, Casino and Gare du Midi as well as 328 feet from Biarritz central market. It offers free WiFi and Canal + channel.

The charming Maison du Lierre hotel provides numerous services. These include breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace in summertime. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests also access the onsite sauna, massage services and spa treatments.

Each room has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. The rooms overlook an interior courtyard. Some have a balcony or terrace.

Guests have access to a private living room with a computer corner.

hotel_name: Hôtel du Palais Biarritz, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
hotel_description:
This 5-star hotel has 2 pools and a spa and fitness center with hammam, hot tub and massage treatments.

The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Hôtel du Palais Biarritz have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free Wi-Fi access and some have a separate seating area.

La Rotonde Restaurant features a contemporary French cuisine. You can finish the day by having a cocktail in Napoleon III Bar.

You can have the breakfast and dinner overlooking a terrace.

There is a children’s playground on site. The hotel is a 2-minute walk from the casino and 10 minutes from the town center. Biarritz-Le-Phare golf course is a 10-minute drive away and Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 1.9 mi from the Palais.

Located in the seaside town of Biarritz, the Grand Tonic Hotel & SPA Biarritz is only 656 feet from the Grand Plage for a perfect stay on foot.

The hotel offers a shaded terrace and elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Our air-conditioned rooms are almost all equipped with a hot tub in the bathroom. Each floor at the Grand Tonic Hotel is individually themed and equipped with international cabled television.

The LMB Restaurant serves fine cuisine where the guests can enjoy a coctail at the bar. Also, an all-you-can-eat continental buffet breakfast is served every morning.

For a perfect stay, you can relax in the heated indoor swimming pool, the hammam or the sauna of the SPA of the hotel. You will also find a treatment brochure (to book in advance) for your moment of relaxation.

Private paid parking is available for our guests with prior booking. Also, there is a public parking Biarritz Barrière Casino which is just 984 feet away.

Biarritz-Le Phare Golf Course is 0.6 mi away.

This is our travelers' favorite part of Biarritz, according to independent reviews.
Couples particularly appreciate the location of this establishment. They give it a score of 9.2 for a stay for two.

hotel_address: 3, esplanade du Port Vieux, 64200 Biarritz, France
hotel_description:
Located in Biarritz and facing the ocean, Hôtel de La Plage offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access just 164 feet from the Plage du Vieux Port. The train station is located a 10-minute drive away.

The rooms at Hôtel de La Plage have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms have a view of the sea. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. All type of restaurants can be found within 492 feet.

The hotel is a 5-minuted rive from the center of Biarritz and 9.3 mi from Saint-Jean de Luz. Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is located a 10-minute drive away.

Hôtel Le Café de Paris is in central Biarritz, on the pedestrian Place Bellevue and a 5-minute walk from the Halls. All the rooms have panoramic views of the sea.

All rooms are equipped with en suite Italian ceramic bathrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite and Canal+ channels and free Wi-Fi.

Guests can sample refined cuisine in Hôtel Le Café de Paris’ restaurant, which hasa menu elaborated by the Michelin-starred chef Cédric Béchade. The restaurant offers an outdoor terrace overlooking the Place Bellevue and the sea.

Discover the brand new décor of the Regina Experimental Biarritz from July 2023!

Standing on a cliff facing the ocean, the Regina Experimental overlooks the bay of Biarritz. Its large preserved volumes have been cleverly mixed with local inspirations by interior designer Dorothée Meilichzon: neo-Basque architecture, Art Deco, or the art of living by the sea. Accessible from open halls on the atrium, the seventy-two white, blue, dark green and Basque red rooms face the ocean or the Biarritz golf course. The vast hotel restaurant and its large terrace facing the ocean welcome Frenchie Biarritz, a creative brasserie rooted in the beautiful Basque culinary culture. The spa treatments are inspired by the power of the Alps with Susanne Kaufmann products combined with Alaena, the emblematic brand of this oceanic region.

hotel_address: 7 rue du Port Vieux , 64200 Biarritz, France
hotel_facilities: Books, DVDs or music for children
hotel_description:
Set in the Old Town in Biarritz, this nonsmoking hotel is located just 328 feet from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV are provided in the guest rooms.

A glimpse of the sea or the courtyard is offered in each room, and some rooms feature a balcony. All of the rooms have a private bathroom, and some have a walk-in shower.

You can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast while reading the newspapers provided.

Biarritz Barrière Casino is just 2297 feet from the hotel and Biarritz Train Station is 2.5 mi away. Restaurants, bars and nightclubs are located 164 feet away.

Mas de la Tour Carbonnière offers self-catering accommodations in Aigues-Mortes. Separated into individual apartments, each unit has access to a shared outdoor pool, a closed garden and a private terrace. Free WiFi is available in public areas and there is free private parking for guests with a vehicle.

The apartments include a seating area and a dining area. Each have a well-equipped kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator. The private bathrooms either have a bath or a shower.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, with special diet menus available on request. A continental breakfast is optional and can be requested for an additional fee.

This property is just a 6-minute drive from Aigues-Mortes famous for its pink salt marshes. Guests can explore the area either on foot or by bicycle.

The nearest airport is Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport, 17 mi from Mas de la Tour Carbonnière.

hotel_description:
Hotel Des 4 vents is located in Aigues-Mortes, on the Mediterranean coast, 25 mi from Nimes and 22 mi from Montpellier. It offers air-conditioned accommodations with free WiFi , defibrillator and an outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the medieval town. The surrounding lakes can be found less than a 10-minute drive away.

Each room at the 4 Vents is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. Rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served daily and the Hotel des 4 Vents has a garden terrace. Guests can relax in the bar.

Free private parking is available on site.

The air-conditioned accommodation is 15 miles from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and Montpellier Arena is 15 miles away.

Montpellier Town Hall is 18 miles from the apartment, while The Corum is 20 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 18 miles from appartement n2 centre village, clim, parking gratuit.

With free Wifi, this 3-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Zenith Sud Montpellier is 18 miles from the apartment, while Odysseum Shopping Center is 18 miles away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 19 miles from Maison T4 -Jardin+ Parking+ Clim -Proche Remparts.

hotel_description:
LE FLAMANT ROSE - COSYKAZ is a sustainable apartment in Aigues-Mortes, 14 miles from Montpellier Arena. This property encourages guests to embrace nature with its eco-friendly arrangements. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking, and free Wifi. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Parc des Expositions de Montpellier is 14 miles from LE FLAMANT ROSE - COSYKAZ, while Zenith Sud Montpellier is 17 miles away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 17 miles from the accommodation.

hotel_address: CD 979 Route de Nîmes, 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
hotel_description:
Le Mas des Sables welcomes you in a park of 7 hectares of greenery 1.2 mi from the ramparts of the medieval city of Aigues-Mortes. Guests are invited to relax in the garden or take a swim in the outdoor pool. Free WiFi and free parking are available. Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer is 17 mi away.

Rooms at Le Mas des Sables are air-conditioned and decorated in a Mediterranean style. They are equipped with a telephone, satellite TV and private bathroom. Most of the rooms overlook the garden. Rooms on the ground floor distributed in 4-bedroom pavilions.

The Mas des Sables serves regional specialties in the dining room decorated in Camargue style or on the flowered terrace.

Le Mas des Sables has direct access to the Via Rhôna, a cycling route linking Lake Geneva to the Mediterranean, between stages 20 and 21 of the Avignon to Sète section.

The property is a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport.

This bed and breakfast offers accommodations with a terrace. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and Montpellier Arena is 15 miles away.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. The accommodation is non-smoking.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast.

Odysseum Shopping Center is 18 miles from Maison aigues-mortaise dans la cité, while Montpellier Town Hall is 18 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 18 miles from the accommodation.

Les suites du 17 offers accommodations in Aigues-Mortes, 15 miles from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier and 17 miles from Zenith Sud Montpellier. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation offers a patio. Free Wifi is available throughout the property, and Montpellier Arena is 15 miles away.

Accommodation is equipped with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer, and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave, and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the guest house can enjoy walking tours and bike tours nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Odysseum Shopping Center is 18 miles from Les suites du 17, while Montpellier Town Hall is 18 miles away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 18 miles from the accommodation.

hotel_description:
MAS de COLOMINA is located in Aigues-Mortes, just 19 miles from Zenith Sud Montpellier and 20 miles from Odysseum Shopping Center. With free private parking, the property is 17 miles from Montpellier Arena and 17 miles from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. Montpellier Town Hall is 20 miles from the vacation home and The Corum is 22 miles away.

The air-conditioned vacation home consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A private entrance leads guests into the vacation home, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A private beach area can be found at the vacation home, along with a garden.

Fabre Museum is 22 miles from MAS de COLOMINA, while Place de la Comédie is 22 miles away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 20 miles from the accommodation.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

hotel_name: Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel
hotel_description:
Featuring free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel is located in Aigues-Mortes, a 15-minute drive from the Carmague Natural Regional Park. The nearest beach is a 15-minute drive away. Free parking is available on site.

Certain rooms include views of the pool or garden. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms also feature a private terrace.

A buffet breakfast is available for an extra charge.

Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel also provides meeting facilities.

Nîmes is 25 mi from Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel, while Arles is 28 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 16 mi from the property.

hotel_description:
Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière" is located in Aigues-Mortes. This hotel features free WiFi and a terrace. The property is located in the Aigues-Mortes Medieval City district.

At the hotel, the air conditioned rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area.

Montpellier is 16 mi from Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière". The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 12 mi from the accommodations. Free public parking card is offered upon arrival.

Maison des Croisades in Aigues-Mortes offers bike rental and a garden. The hotel features free WiFi and a terrace. Guests can enjoy Canal & Garden Views. Le Grau-du-Roi beach is a 10-minute drive away.

All rooms in Maison des Croisades are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at Maison des Croisades can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Montpellier is 21 mi from Maison des Croisades, while Nîmes is 27 mi from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 15 mi away.

Set in Aigues-Mortes, Résidence Odalys Fleur de Sel is a 5-minute walk from the historic town center and offers a seasonal outdoor heated pool. Free WiFi is available on site.

The apartments are spread throughout small maisonettes and each features a private bathroom, a living room with a flat-screen TV and a fully-equipped kitchenette. Some apartments have a terrace or balcony.

Montpellier is 16 mi from Résidence Odalys Fleur de Sel. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 11 mi from the property. Free outdoor parking is available.

Maison Arthur offers accommodations in Aigues-Mortes, 15 miles from Montpellier Arena and 15 miles from Parc des Expositions de Montpellier. There's a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. The bed and breakfast features free Wifi and free private parking.

Featuring a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Rooms have a coffee machine, while some rooms also boast a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave, and a fridge. At the bed and breakfast, units have bed linen and towels.

Zenith Sud Montpellier is 17 miles from the bed and breakfast, while Odysseum Shopping Center is 18 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 18 miles from Maison Arthur.

Located in a former military station dating from the 18th-century, inside the medieval ramparts of Aigues-Mortes, this refined hotel offers a bar and a terrace with sun loungers. There is also a spa with an indoor heated pool. This boutique hotel is located opposite the Tower of Constance and The Center for National Monuments.

The guest rooms with ceiling heights between 3.30 and 13 feet feature stone walls, a mini-bar, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. All rooms come with a bathroom with a free standing bathtub, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. There is no separation between the sleeping area and the bathroom. They all feature views of the ramparts.

A continental breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the lounges or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features contemporary furniture and panoramic views of the ramparts.

Aigues-Mortes Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel while Montpellier Méditerranée Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Golf de la Grande Motte is 7.5 mi from the hotel.

hotel_address: 221 Avenue Du Pont De Provence, 30220 Aigues-Mortes, France
hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture
hotel_description:
Le Médiéval is located on the banks of the canal in Aigues-Mortes, 19 mi from Montpellier. It offers rooms with attached bathroom, free parking and an outdoor swimming pool.

Hotel Le Médiéval provides a daily buffet continental-style breakfast that can be taken on the terrace in fine weather. The hotel also provides free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Free private parking is possible on site and the medieval ramparts are a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 5-minute walk to the fortified city, on the banks of the canal, visible from its panoramic terrace and swimming pool. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Free parking is available and garage parking is possible for an extra charge, or free of charge for motorbikes.

All of the rooms in the 3-star Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV with French and foreign channels.

In the warmer months the buffet breakfast can be eaten on the outdoor terrace. In the summer, guests can also enjoy snacks or light meals by the canal.

Bicycle rental is available onsite and there is also a seminar room for meetings.

Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 10-minute drive from Grau-du-Roi beach and a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport. Aigues-Mortes train station is a 4-minute walk away. Montpellier, Arles and Nîmes can all be reached within 45 minutes by car.

hotel_facilities: Tour or class about local culture

hotel_description:
Set in the historical heart of Aigues-Mortes, 200 yards from the Tour de Constance, Hôtel Saint Louis is an air-conditioned hotel with a wellness center and restaurant. Free WiFi access is available on site and public city parking spots are available for free.

All rooms feature a contemporary décor inspired by the region and are fitted a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a telephone. Each room has a private bathroom.
